snippet: In a new twist on personalized mobile ads, InMobi is debuting Miip, an animated monkey character that follows you from app to app, watches what you’re doing and suggests products that you might want to buy.
abstract: In a new twist on personalized mobile ads, InMobi is debuting Miip, an animated monkey character that follows you from app to app, watches what you’re doing and suggests products that you might want to buy.

headline.main: Meet Miip, the Ad Monkey in Your App
